line_1: Whom fiery suns that scorch the russet spice
line_2: Of eastern groves, and oceans floor'd with ice;

line_1: Sweet'ning the bitter draught with sav'ry spice,
line_2: Not so with him — he paints each reigning vice

line_1: 'Mongst thyine woods and groves of spice,
line_2: The wealthy crops of whit'ning rice,

line_1: Better be twisted into caps for spice,
line_2: Better to bottom tarts and cheesecakes nice,
